page.title: 04SCHOOL CAMP AT ST.ANTHONY
page.content: {Begining Friday 14th June children {from class 4 and 5 spent a week {camping.Here are some of their {comments: I think the best part was going to the beach where I rowed for the first time. Every evening we had hot cocoa which was lovely.I wish I had a bigger cup. Mrs.Griffiths wrote a poem about camp and Mrs.Axe did some illustrations. {Matthew Kessell I liked fetching water because it was fun and we got wet.The best part was at night when we told jokes but I didn't like walking round the field because we talked too much.{ { Hilary Lightfoot After breakfast every day we had tent inspection,and our tent won 4 times. {Jennifer Eva
